name: py-spacy
description:
spaCy is a library for advanced Natural Language Processing in Python
and Cython.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-cymem
dependencies.description: Manage calls to calloc/free through Cython.

dependencies.name: py-preshed
dependencies.description: preshed: Cython Hash Table for Pre-Hashed Keys.

dependencies.name: py-thinc
dependencies.description: Thinc: Practical Machine Learning for NLP in Python.

dependencies.name: py-blis
dependencies.description:
Cython BLIS: Fast BLAS-like operations from Python and Cython, without
the tears

dependencies.name: py-wasabi
dependencies.description: wasabi: A lightweight console printing and formatting toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-srsly
dependencies.description: srsly: Modern high-performance serialization utilities for Python.

dependencies.name: py-catalogue
dependencies.description: catalogue: Super lightweight function registries for your library.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-plac
dependencies.description: The smartest command line arguments parser in the world.

dependencies.name: py-pathlib
dependencies.description:
Object-oriented filesystem paths. Attention: this backport module isn't
maintained anymore. If you want to report issues or contribute patches,
please consider the pathlib2 project instead.

dependent_to.name: py-spacy-models-en-core-web-sm
dependent_to.description:
English multi-task CNN trained on OntoNotes. Assigns context-specific
token vectors, POS tags, dependency parse and named entities.

dependent_to.name: py-fastai
dependent_to.description:
You can use fastai without any installation by using Google Colab. In
fact, every page of this documentation is also available as an
interactive notebook - click "Open in colab" at the top of any page to
open it (be sure to change the Colab runtime to "GPU" to have it run
fast!) See the fast.ai documentation on Using Colab for more
information.

dependent_to.name: py-spacy-models-en-vectors-web-lg
dependent_to.description: 1.2m 300d vectors trained on Common Crawl with GloVe

dependent_to.name: py-convokit
dependent_to.description:
This toolkit contains tools to extract conversational features and
analyze social phenomena in conversations, using a single unified
interface inspired by (and compatible with) scikit-learn.
